main event: Lieutenant Commander Richard Byrd and five others sighted a metallic, oblong-shaped object hovering over the trees in El Mojan, Venezuela on June 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 40-50 feet long and 15-20 feet wide., The UFO remained visible for about 5 minutes., It accelerated and disappeared from view., There is a photograph of the UFO in the report., The document mentions a crude sketch labeled 'CRUDE HOAX' depicting a UFO.
witness description: Lieutenant Commander Richard Byrd and five others
